quote: The road to happiness lies in two simple principles: find what interests you and that you can do well  and put your whole soul into it-every bit of energy and ambition and natural ability you have.
quote_letters: THE ROAD TO HAPPINESS LIES IN TWO SIMPLE PRINCIPLES FIND WHAT INTERESTS YOU AND THAT YOU CAN DO WELL  AND PUT YOUR WHOLE SOUL INTO IT-EVERY BIT OF ENERGY AND AMBITION AND NATURAL ABILITY YOU HAVE
